text: Echo Park is a 1986 Austrian American comedy-drama movie directed by Robert Dornhelm and starring Susan Dey, Tom Hulce, Michael Bowen, Shirley Jo Finney, Cheech Marin, Timothy Carey, Cassandra Peterson, Heinrich Schweiger. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Austrian comedy movies Category:Austrian drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Dornhelm Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Echo Park (1986 movie)
